Package org.demoiselle.signer.core.extension

Documentation of package (put it here)

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicCertificate
    Basic Certificate information based on ICP-BRASIL (PKI) definitions.
    CertificateExtra
    Provide access to extra information for ICP-Brasil certificates.
    DefaultExtensionLoader
    Load X.509 Extension OIDs for CRL_URL, SERIAL_NUMBER, ISSUER_DN, SUBJECT_DN, KEY_USAGE, PATH_LENGTH, AUTHORITY_KEY_IDENTIFIER, SUBJECT_KEY_IDENTIFIER, BEFORE_DATE, AFTER_DATE, CERTIFICATION_AUTHORITY
    ICPBR_CRL
    ICP-BRASIL's definitions of Certificate Revocation List (CRL) on X509CRL format.
    ICPBR_DN
    ICP-BRASIL's definitions of Distinguished Name (DN).
    ICPBrasilExtensionLoader
    Load X.509 Extension OIDs for ICP-Brasil's extensions.
    ICPBRCertificateEquipment
    Has some "ICP-BRASIL Pessoa Juridica and Equipment" attributes oid1 2.16.76.1.3.2 and content = name of the person responsible for the certificate. oid2 2.16.76.1.3.3 and content= Brazilian National Registry of Bussiness Entities called Cadastro Nacional de Pessoa Juridica (CNPJ), if the certificate is a CNPJ. oid3 2.16.76.1.3.4 and content = In the first 8 (eight) positions, the Date of birth of the person responsible for the certificate, in ddmmaaaa format. In the 11 (eleven) subsequent positions, the Brazilian IRS Individuals Registry number called CPF of the Responsible; In the 11 (eleven) subsequent positions, the number of Brazilian Social Identification number - NIS (PIS, PASEP or CI); In the 15 (fifteen) positions Subsequent, the Brazilian ID number (called RG) of the responsible for the certificate; In the six (6) positions Subsequent, the initials of the issuing agency of the ID (RG) and its UF (Initials for a Brasilian state). oid4 2.16.76.1.3.8 and content = Corporate name in the the Brazilian IRS's Bussiness Company Registry Number caled CNPJ without abbreviations, if its is an equipment certificate.
    ICPBRCertificatePF
    Implemented Class for ICP-BRASIL (DOC-ICP-04) "PESSOA FISICA" Certificates.
    ICPBRCertificatePJ
    Implemented Class for ICP-BRASIL (DOC-ICP-04) "PESSOA JURIDICA" Certificates.
    ICPBRKeyUsage
    ICP-BRASIL's definitions of Key Usage.
    ICPBRSubjectAlternativeNames
    ICP-BRASIL's definitions of Subject Alternative Names.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DefaultExtensionType
    Enums for extensions.
    ICPBrasilExtensionType
    Enums for ICP-Brasil's extensions.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    DefaultExtension
    Annotation to identify default extension.
    ICPBrasilExtension
    Annotation to identify X509 Extension for ICP-BRASIL's definitions.
